contents: <sup>1</sup>Freedom is important. <sup>2</sup>Consider this example. <sup>3</sup>A person has a curable ailment. <sup>4</sup>Two treatments are available. <sup>5</sup>One is nothing more than a placebo in __________ bottle. <sup>6</sup>The other is a proven cure. <sup>7</sup>A person who lacks information and education can be manipulated by the company selling the placebo. <sup>8</sup>The person can make a choice, but it is not an informed choice. <sup>9</sup>Freedom are what you have when you have education and information.
